AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Apprentice Craftsman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [Pawn_possessive] days at the great forges, learning how to shape wood and metal. [PAWN_possessive] work was much appreciated by the warriors, who often left [Pawn_possessive] snacks and gifts in exchange for equipment repairs. However, [Pawn_possessive] love of flames continued to grow unchecked...
